DOC.brief_title: Nutritional Therapy Education With Multimedia Application Patients With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: Randomized clinical trial . Subjects type 2 diabetes three Family Medicine Units ( primary care ) , HbA1c > 6.5 % < 13.0 % , without advanced macro microvascular complication diabetes . Two arm : experimental group nutrition therapy plus education diabetes multimedia application . The application seven module : Introduction , nutrition , physical exercise diabetes , myth truth diabetes , metabolic control parameter , know diabetes , complication diabetes . The control group receive usual nutrition therapy . A monthly follow first 7 month bimonthly , 21 month total follow , reinforcement visit nutrition non-pharmacological therapy , control weight blood pressure . Laboratory study include HbA1c , lipid profile , creatinine albuminuria , perform 7 , 14 21 month . Results provide patient family physician , modification drug treatment need , perform .
